FROM  movie_companies mc, movie_info mi, movie_info_idx mi_idx, title t 
WHERE mi.info IN ('Dolby SR','Turkish','USA:10') AND mi_idx.info > '3.9' AND t.production_year > '2011'

sql:
select n.name
from title as t,
name as n,
cast_info as ci,
movie_info as mi,
info_type as it1,
info_type as it2,
person_info as pi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id
AND t.id = mi.movie_id
AND ci.person_id = n.id
AND it1.id > '28'
AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id
AND mi.info ILIKE '%)%'
AND it2.info ILIKE '%birth%'
AND pi.person_id = n.id
AND pi.info_type_id = it2.id
AND pi.info ILIKE '%0 Feb%'
group by n.name
order by count(*) DESC
best_hints:
SeqScan(pi)
SeqScan(it2)
IndexScan(n)
IndexScan(ci)
IndexScan(mi)
SeqScan(it1)
IndexOnlyScan(t)
HashJoin(pi it2)
NestLoop(pi it2 n)
NestLoop(pi it2 n ci)
NestLoop(pi it2 n ci mi)

select n.name
from title as t,
name as n,
cast_info as ci,
movie_info as mi,
info_type as it1,

person_info as pi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id

AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id

AND it2.info ILIKE '%birth%'

from title as t,
name as n,
cast_info as ci,
movie_info as mi,
info_type as it1,

WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id

from title as t,
name as n,
cast_info as ci,

sql: SELECT MIN(mi.info) AS movie_budget, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS movie_votes, MIN(kt.kind) AS movie_type, MIN(t.title) AS violent_movie FROM cast_info ci, company_name cn, info_type it1, info_type it2, keyword k, movie_companies mc, movie_info mi, movie_info_idx mi_idx, movie_keyword mk, title t, kind_type kt WHERE ci.note IN ('(as Jerry Greenberg)','(as John Contardo)') AND cn.country_code = '[us]' AND it1.info = 'runtimes' AND it2.info = 'rating' AND k.keyword IN ('undercover') AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%h%' AND mi.info IN ('143','170','UK:92','USA:106') AND t.production_year < '2000' AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id AND t.kind_id =kt.id;
